page.title: 05INDUSTRY
page.content:
School is a fine seventeenth century building which is now used for social events.
At the end of the Village street is a neat little War Memorial set in a small garden in memory of those who died in the two World Wars.
{INDUSTRY
The one important industry in the Village is an old-established firm manufacturing high quality chairs.
Ashort distance outside the Village on the road to Longridge is the well-known Chipping Dairy, making butter and cheese.
Futher down the same road is the hamlet of Hesketh Lane where there is
